description:
This course is for:

  • shy or under-confident individuals who want to drastically improve their skills of social interaction,
  • introverts who are keen to improve their people skills and learn how to be totally memorable,
  • already sociable individuals who want to learn how to be utterly magnetic.
By the end of this course, you'll be able to:
  • Interact socially in a very highly confident manner,
  • Increase your confidence and self-esteem in leaps and bounds,
  • Magnetically attract the people you want into your life,
  • Create the most incredible rapport with others using special body language techniques,
  • Practise the secrets of highly charismatic people that will enable you to be the most memorable person in the room,
  • Make the best first impressions possible!
What will I get from this course?
  • 21 videos and audio lectures, cheat sheets, magnetic tips and over 3 hours of content.
  • The expertise of a teacher and life coach with over 21 years experience in social interaction, group leadership and client transformation.
  • Quick and easy techniques to practice and implement straight away that will give you amazing confidence and ultimate rapport with others.
What are the course requirements?
  • An Intermediate level of English
  • A keenness to connect with the right kind of people and revolutionise your social interactions!
title: The Art of Social Magnetism
